## ğŸ› Bug Reports

If you've found a bug, please:

1. **Search existing issues** to see if it's already reported
2. **Use the bug report template** when creating a new issue
3. **Provide detailed information** including:
   - Steps to reproduce
   - Expected vs actual behavior
   - Browser and OS information
   - Screenshots or error messages

[Report a Bug â†’](https://github.com/ayoub3bidi/bayan-flow/issues/new?assignees=&labels=bug&template=bug_report.yml)

[Request a Feature â†’](https://github.com/ayoub3bidi/bayan-flow/issues/new?assignees=&labels=enhancement&template=feature_request.yml)

## â±ï¸ Response Times

We aim to respond to issues and questions within:

- **Critical bugs**: 24-48 hours
- **General bugs**: 3-5 business days
- **Feature requests**: 1-2 weeks
- **Questions**: 2-3 business days

Please note that this is an open-source project maintained by volunteers, so response times may vary.

## ğŸ¤ Community Guidelines

When seeking support, please:

- **Be respectful** and patient
- **Provide clear, detailed information**
- **Search existing issues** before creating new ones
- **Follow our [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)**
- **Use appropriate labels** and templates

## ğŸ”’ Security Issues

For security-related issues, please **do not** create public issues. Instead:

- **Email**: [contact@ayoub3bidi.me](mailto:contact@ayoub3bidi.me)
- **Subject**: "Bayan Flow Security"
- **Follow our [Security Policy](../SECURITY.md)**
